user.title: Set up Sony Projector
user.description: Choose how you would like to add your projector.

data_description.host: Enter the IP address or hostname of your projector.
data_description.name: Give your projector a friendly name.

scan.title: Select a projector
scan.description: Select a projector that was discovered on your network ({count} found).

data_description.host: Select the projector you want to add.

confirm.title: Add Sony Projector
confirm.description: Do you want to add {name} at {host}?

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the projector.
error.no_devices_found: No projectors were found. Try again.

abort.wrong_device: The projector does not match the configuration being updated.
